revised_title: Introduction to Halesia and Gardenia: Two New Genera of Plants
tldr: In this letter, John Ellis introduces two new genera of plants, Halesia and Gardenia, and describes their characteristics. Halesia is a tree with beautiful bell-shaped flowers and hard, veined wood, while Gardenia is a shrub with aromatic, double milk-white flowers and evergreen leaves. Both plants are valuable additions to European gardens.
